ygData.subject: Re: Educating the masses
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm...bellow yourself? I had never thought of that.  This is one of my fears, that there are so many ways I could be using my songs but just don t know about.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm...bellow yourself? I had never thought of that. This is one of my fears, that there are so many ways I could be using my songs but just don't know about. Someone needs to make a list of songs with ALL possible uses we have found. Since I play on PvP it does make some of the songs tougher to use, for example in Cazic Thule, there are so many people around if I use sleep or melodic binding I get something like "Lizard Protector's head nods" "WandatheWizard head nods" RodneytheRanger head nods" etc. Needless to say they are not happy with their little nap ; ) I use the same 2 or 3 songs over and over and don't want to miss out on something potentially awesome! Also anyone with pets in my group automatically attack me when I sing any non-party song. Another thing is that the invis song KILLS pets instantly. Is that just on my server or everywhere? Love the information I get from here, keep up the great work!

Infiniti
Level 29 Bard
Rallos Zek
